translation.loginFrase: Log in or register to start impacting lives today.
translation.loginTextPart1: Be the change you want to see in the world.
translation.destaquesCarousel1SegundaFrase: Want to make a difference but don't know any NGOs?
translation.destaquesCarousel2SegundaFrase: Dedicate your time and talent to make a difference in someone's life.
translation.destaquesCarousel3SegundaFrase: Donate and start accumulating points, earn tickets and vouchers
translation.destaquesCarousel4TerceiraFrase: and get access to collaboration opportunities.
translation.destaquesCarousel5TerceiraFrase: on social media and stay updated with our news and opportunities to get involved.
translation.sobreSurgiuImpacto: Impact emerged from 7 people who met at the PROA Institute, a place that offers a programming course. This course involves a group project called Demoday where you have to make a presentation. From this, the idea of Impact arose, and we saw how much NGOs and Institutions face significant challenges. That’s why what started as a project turned into a Startup because we know we can transform lives and contribute to a better society.
translation.sobreNossaMissao: Our mission is to be the bridge between the desire to help and the opportunity to make a difference. On our platform, we unite generous hearts with transformative causes, offering a unique experience that allows people to contribute to a better world, whether through financial donations or volunteer involvement.
translation.sobreNossaVisao: To transform the world into a place where generosity is a powerful and accessible force for everyone, empowering people to become agents of change.
translation.sobreNossosValores: Impact prioritizes essential values that guide its actions: absolute transparency to build trust and integrity; continuous innovation to solve social challenges creatively and effectively; inclusion and diversity, ensuring representation and appreciation of all involved; strategic collaboration, recognizing the importance of partnerships to achieve ambitious goals; commitment to measurable impact, ensuring concrete and meaningful results; and social responsibility, promoting a fairer and more supportive future through its initiatives.
translation.sobrePorQueImpacto: We chose Impact because we want to make an impact around the world with our platform, and we also noticed that this word is commonly used when talking about transforming lives
translation.sobrePorQuePonte: Yes! Our logo symbolizes a bridge because our intention is to be the bridge between NGOs and donors
translation.sobrePorQueSlogan: This is our slogan, which represents what we want to bring to the world, uniting causes (NGOs and Donors), transforming lives (Helping those who are helping)
translation.sobreNossosParceirosTexto: We have profound gratitude to our partners for joining our community and managing to transform lives around the world!
translation.doacoesDoeParaTodosText: Don't have a specific NGO to donate to? Here your donation will be equally distributed to all registered NGOs!
translation.doacooesDoeParaTodosImageAlt: Image of a white person, dressed in business clothes and sitting in a chair holding a blue heart
translation.doacoesFavoritosEmpty: You haven't favorited any NGOs yet, how about doing it now?
translation.shoppingFezUmaDoacaoHoje: Have you made a donation today?
translation.shoppingRecompensarPorIsso: We want to reward you for that!
translation.shoppingAumentarPontosDoacao: Increase your points by making donations and volunteering!
translation.shoppingAumentarPontosConvidando: Invite a friend to donate to any NGO and earn 10 points!
